education.title: Education
education.description: We’re preparing practical, easy-to-run AI programs for schools and universities. This page grows with real content.
education.lede: Programs for schools and universities in Latvia.
education.page_description: Short, practical AI programs for Latvian schools and universities.
education.hero_description: Short, practical AI programs for Latvian schools and universities. Clear lessons, safe tools, projects you can run.
education.program_1_description: How it works, where it's useful, and what to avoid. Practical understanding without the hype.
education.program_2_description: Turn a real problem into a small prototype. Learn to validate ideas and iterate.
education.program_3_description: Collecting, cleaning, and making sense of information. Hands-on with real datasets.
education.program_4_description: Complete small projects from idea to working demo. Learn the full cycle.
education.cta_description: We're building these programs with schools and universities across Latvia.

hero.title: Accessible AI for travel, startups, and schools.
hero.subtitle: We are a Latvia-based studio building NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and education pilots while offering transparent consulting support.

highlights.title: What you get
highlights.item_1_body: NodeVoyage and Ideonautix move from alpha to beta with a shared accessibility-first design system.
highlights.item_2_body: Lesson plans, toolkits, and teacher training with partners like LIAA.
highlights.item_3_body: Pilot sprints that pair strategy, build, and training so teams stay confident.
highlights.item_4_body: Guides, newsletters, and meetups for families, founders, and educators.

offer.title: What we offer
offer.consulting_body: We map use cases, co-design workflows, and stay through the launch so your team keeps ownership.
offer.consulting_bullet_1: Automation roadmaps that respect existing rituals and regulations.
offer.consulting_bullet_2: Pilot sprints with measurable outcomes, clear documentation, and opt-out controls.
offer.consulting_bullet_3: Training that hands ownership back to your team the moment the sprint completes.
offer.products_body: NodeVoyage and Ideonautix share one platform: multilingual UI, privacy-safe AI, and signage-grade reliability.
offer.products_bullet_1: NodeVoyage: an AI-assisted travel planner with collaborative tools, sustainability tracking, and AR translation.
offer.products_bullet_2: Ideonautix: Pomodoro Coach, Pitch Assistant, and Competitive Intelligence modules tuned for founders and students.
offer.products_bullet_3: Shared AI orchestration, accessibility tokens, and localisation for six languages from the first release.
offer.education_body: Classroom kits and workshops co-created with Latvian educators, easy to adapt and localise.
offer.education_bullet_1: Teacher programmes spanning basics to leadership with practical, plain-language resources.
offer.education_bullet_2: Planned reach: up to 80% of Latvian institutions, supporting 25k+ students yearly and 500+ trained teachers.
offer.education_bullet_3: Partnership model with LIAA for events, curriculum input, and long-term measurement.

home.hero_lead: We build practical AI tools and help teams adopt them quickly.

brand.section_copy: Everything starts with honest execution, transparent updates, and measurable impact.

overview.title: Who we are
overview.copy: AlgoRhythmics is a Latvia-based, pre-company stage initiative building accessible AI tools, consulting pilots, and education programmes. We stay transparent about our build status and choose partners who value measurable progress.
overview.bullet_1: Mission: unlock useful AI for everyday people, schools, startups, and small businesses across Latvia and beyond.
overview.bullet_2: Operating from Daugavpils and Riga with a remote-first mindset and a 50/50 co-leadership model.
overview.bullet_3: Rooted in Reclame Fabriek’s Signage Research Department for real-world R&D discipline.

pillars.title: Three pillars, one rhythm
pillars.copy: Products, consulting, and education move together so partners see impact and skills growth quickly.
pillars.bullet_1: NodeVoyage travel OS and Ideonautix founder toolkit are in active build.
pillars.bullet_2: Consulting sprints map automation, integrate AI safely, and train teams to own the outputs.
pillars.bullet_3: Education programmes with LIAA align classroom pilots, teacher training, and community events.

impact.title: Why this matters
impact.copy: Accessible AI only works when it stays transparent, inclusive, and measurable. That is our baseline.
impact.bullet_1: Useful AI tools that explain themselves, respect autonomy, and support multiple languages.
impact.bullet_2: Structured programmes with measurable outcomes for schools and cultural partners.
impact.bullet_3: Focused startup support that removes noise and protects time.
impact.bullet_4: Fair, local-friendly pricing that scales outward with proof.

blueprint.title: How we build
blueprint.lead: Our stack combines signage-grade reliability with modern product cadence. Every layer tracks accessibility, privacy, and documentation.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.item_1: SvelteKit + TypeScript with WCAG 2.2 AA/AAA coverage, responsive layouts, and light/dark modes.
frontend.item_2: Multilingual interface (EN/LV/RU/UK/FR/ES) using shared tokens and motion guidelines tuned for accessibility.

backend.title: Backend & Cloud
backend.item_1: Google Cloud stack (Cloud Run, Cloud SQL/Postgres, Firestore, Storage, Redis) with Fastify APIs and Prisma.
backend.item_2: OpenAPI-first contracts, CI/CD pipelines, and observability baked in.

ai.title: AI Layer
ai.item_1: Vertex AI as primary, OpenAI as fallback, with on-device models when privacy matters.
ai.item_2: Explainable prompts, opt-out controls, and clear audit trails for every decision.

realtime.title: Realtime & Quality
realtime.item_1: WebSockets and SSE for collaboration, plus testing from unit to accessibility checks.
realtime.item_2: CI pipelines mirror signage QA discipline with scenario scripts and visual diffing.

security.title: Security & privacy
security.item_1: GDPR-first, encryption everywhere, role-based access, and monitoring for every release.

vision.title: Where we are heading next
vision.copy: Our roadmap stays public so partners can see how products, education pilots, and consulting add up to one accessible AI platform.

products.title: Product milestones
products.copy: NodeVoyage and Ideonautix release in stages: alpha with guided pilots, beta with multilingual rollouts, and general availability once the shared access platform is proven.
products.bullet_1: Alpha builds focus on collaborative planning, explainable AI, and mobile capture.
products.bullet_2: Public beta targets June 2026 with Latvian, English, and Russian support.
products.bullet_3: Planned pricing to stay under €3/month with family and student discounts from day one.

education.title: Education targets
education.copy: Together with LIAA partners we grow AI literacy across Latvia before expanding to the wider region.
education.bullet_1: Planned reach includes up to 80% of institutions with adaptable lesson packs and teacher training.
education.bullet_2: Planned to support up to 25k+ students per year with project-based learning and bilingual resources.
education.bullet_3: Planned mentorship for 500+ educators with cohorts and follow-up assessments.

consulting.title: Consulting outcomes
consulting.copy: Consulting stays tightly scoped: we co-design, build, and hand over so in-house teams stay confident long after the engagement.
consulting.bullet_1: Each pilot starts with a shared readiness scorecard and success metrics.
consulting.bullet_2: Delivery includes documentation, governance rituals, and opt-out controls.
consulting.bullet_3: We remain on-call for three months to mentor teams as they take full ownership.

pricing.title: Pricing & growth
pricing.lead: Latvia-first pricing keeps entry points between one and three euros. Education discounts stay non-negotiable.
pricing.bullet_1: NodeVoyage and Ideonautix plan to launch with free tiers and a €2.99/month premium option, plus family and student plans.
pricing.bullet_2: Marketing focuses on schools, students, and startup communities with transparent KPIs.
pricing.bullet_3: Risk scenarios include pricing flexibility, education partnerships, and staged expansion to the wider EU.

education_hub.title: Keep up with the AlgoRhythmics build
education_hub.description: The Education Hub collects rollout notes, classroom toolkits, and partner stories so communities can follow our progress without jargon.

insights.title: Latest product and education notes
insights.copy: Readable, multilingual stories co-written with educators, founders, families, and our own R&D team.

case_studies.title: Impact stories & pilots
case_studies.copy: See classrooms, startups, and cultural partners putting accessible AI pilots into daily use.

events.title: Workshops & community jams
events.copy: Join monthly gatherings with transcripts, captions, and shared notes.

hero.title: Accessible AI with signage-grade discipline
hero.subtitle: AlgoRhythmics is a Latvia-born studio co-led by founders who split their time between our products and Reclame Fabriek’s Signage Research Department.
hero.description: We blend signage R&D, accessible design, and honest communication. NodeVoyage and Ideonautix are in development, backed by fabrication work on next-gen LED neon, in-house controllers, custom coatings, and 3D printed components in Daugavpils.

story.heading: Our story
story.intro: AlgoRhythmics began as a Riga side project and now bridges signage innovation, education pilots, and accessible AI tools. We stay transparent about the in-development stage while serving real partners.

milestones.0: Shaped the NodeVoyage and Ideonautix roadmaps around Latvian schools, founders, and families using feedback loops from the Education, Product, and Consulting pillars.
milestones.1: Tested responsible AI rituals with Reclame Fabriek colleagues so signage-floor precision and safety translate into consumer software.
milestones.2: Outlined funding sprints that keep pricing inclusive (EUR 1–3 entries) and education-first metrics at the centre of every release.

story.culture: Our internal rhythm alternates between fabrication labs, usability sessions, and quiet research sprints. We document everything in plain language so collaborators, schools, and investors stay in sync.

vision.title: A clear path to launch
vision.copy: We publish our roadmap so collaborators know exactly how NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and our education pilots come together.

products.title: Product milestones
products.copy: NodeVoyage and Ideonautix share one platform with staged releases from alpha pilots through community rollout.
products.bullet_1: Alpha pilots: collaborative planning, explainable AI rituals, and mobile capture.
products.bullet_2: Public beta: June 2026 with multilingual interface and accessibility tooling.
products.bullet_3: Launch pricing: under €3/month with student and family plans ready.

education.title: Education targets
education.copy: Our LIAA partnership focuses on measurable AI literacy across Latvia before we scale outward.
education.bullet_1: Reach 80% of institutions with adaptable curricula and recorded workshops.
education.bullet_2: Serve 25k+ students annually via blended, bilingual programmes.
education.bullet_3: Mentor 500+ educators with follow-up assessments and community support.

consulting.title: Consulting outcomes
consulting.copy: Every consulting engagement is scoped to transfer ownership back to the client team with clear rituals.
consulting.bullet_1: Scorecards define success metrics and opt-out rules before work begins.
consulting.bullet_2: Documentation and governance kits accompany every prototype or integration.
consulting.bullet_3: Three months of advisory support ensures teams can run independently.

values.title: What keeps us moving
values.copy: Clear language, measurable impact, and inclusive experiences are non-negotiable.

education_first.title: Education first
education_first.copy: We nurture AI literacy in classrooms and community hubs. Free resources and respectful mentorship keep curiosity alive for every learner.

empowerment.title: Empowerment through technology
empowerment.copy: Whether you are a founder, teacher, or student, our tools are designed to feel welcoming, intuitive, and human-centred.

integrity.title: Innovation with integrity
integrity.copy: Ethical guardrails, privacy, and transparency guide every release. We document automation decisions in plain language so trust stays intact.

community.title: Community & collaboration
community.copy: Partnerships with parents, cultural institutions, and industry mentors turn AI into a shared dance rather than a solo act.

team.title: Meet the team
team.copy: We operate as a 50/50 co-leadership duo balancing signage research with accessible AI delivery.

nikita.name: Nikita Jurtaevs
nikita.focus: Strategy, product direction, and partner delivery
nikita.bio: Nikita Jurtaevs serves as CEO in a 50/50 co-leadership model, guiding brand, partnerships, and product UX/QA across NodeVoyage and Ideonautix while contributing to Reclame Fabriek’s Signage Research Department.
nikita.highlight_1: Leads accessible, multilingual delivery plans with LIAA-aligned pilots and a 2025–2026 go-to-market timeline for both platforms.
nikita.highlight_2: Works on next-gen LED neon systems, in-house LED controllers, custom coatings, and full-scale 3D printed components inside Reclame Fabriek R&D.
nikita.highlight_3: Keeps messaging honest: AlgoRhythmics is in development while the founders remain hands-on in Reclame Fabriek’s innovation arm.

slaff.name: Vjaceslavs “Slaff” Trosins
slaff.focus: Technical vision, AI platforms, and delivery
slaff.bio: Vjaceslavs “Slaff” Trosins co-leads AlgoRhythmics as CTO, owning the technical roadmap across web, mobile, APIs, and AI while engineering signage controllers at Reclame Fabriek’s Signage Research Department.
slaff.highlight_1: Designs Google Cloud-first architecture with SvelteKit/TypeScript, Fastify, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Redis/BullMQ, and Vertex AI or Gemini integrations.
slaff.highlight_2: Pairs Reclame Fabriek R&D experience on LED controllers and fabrication pipelines with explainable AI and real-time UX patterns in consumer software.
slaff.highlight_3: Oversees near-term funding sprints—Pomodoro Coach, Startup Pitch Assistant, and Competitive Intelligence Dashboard—to finance broader product build-out and hiring.

finale.title: Join the rhythm
finale.copy: We welcome collaborators who care about accessible technology, joyful learning, and responsible automation. Whether you are exploring careers, partnerships, or sponsorships, let’s build together.

snapshots.title: Product snapshots
snapshots.intro: See work-in-progress screens from Ideonautix and NodeVoyage.
snapshots.ideo_body: A focused workspace for writing and pitching, with clear AI guidance.
snapshots.nv_body: Travel planning with collaborative timelines and transparent AI steps.

cta_block.title: Ready to start?
cta_block.body: Tell us your goals. We will help you choose the simple next step.

footer.note: Pre-incorporation. Ideju Kauss, October 2025. Based in Latvia. Remote-first.
footer.status: Pre-incorporation. Ideju Kauss, October 2025. Based in Latvia. Remote-first.
footer.partners_summary: We iterate alongside signage specialists so every AI prototype respects fabrication reality.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.lede: We make useful things that save time. We set up small, safe prototypes, then grow them with your team.

seo.default_description: AI innovation lab creating NodeVoyage travel platform and Ideonautix productivity suite. Pre-company phase, building Latvia's AI future from Daugavpils.
seo.default_og_description: AI innovation lab creating NodeVoyage travel platform and Ideonautix productivity suite. Pre-company phase, building Latvia's AI future from Daugavpils.

hero.title: NodeVoyage
hero.subtitle: An accessible AI travel planner for families, students, and independent explorers.
hero.description: Describe your next journey and Nodi builds an itinerary that respects budgets, mobility needs, and real-time changes. Plan together, capture memories, and keep everyone informed before, during, and after the trip.

highlights.status_value: Alpha with partner families and classrooms

snapshot.title: Product snapshot
snapshot.alt: Preview of the NodeVoyage travel timeline layout
snapshot.caption: Planning missions, accessibility notes, and collaborative editing are all woven into the upcoming public beta experience.

features.title: What makes NodeVoyage different?
features.lead: NodeVoyage runs like a travel operating system: simple panels, accountable AI coaching, and controls that work for first-time travellers and power planners alike.

0.title: Smart Trip Planner
0.copy: Tell Nodi how you want to feel on your next adventure. NodeVoyage balances hidden gems with essentials, optimises routes, and adjusts for mobility or sensory needs automatically.

1.title: Collaborative Crews
1.copy: Invite family, friends, or classmates into a shared travel canvas. Vote on ideas, track who is editing, and keep everyone aligned with considerate notifications.

2.title: AR Translation & Capture
2.copy: Use the mobile app to translate menus, capture audio notes, or pin AR "memory anchors" to revisit favourite spots later.

3.title: Eco & Community Missions
3.copy: Earn badges for low-impact choices, community storytelling, and cultural challenges curated with local partners.

4.title: Travel Journal & Reel
4.copy: After the trip, NodeVoyage weaves your photos, notes, and check-ins into a shareable story or highlight reel—always with edit controls and privacy toggles.

roadmap.title: 2026 journey
roadmap.lead: We are building NodeVoyage out in the open. Each phase brings more collaborative magic while reinforcing accessibility, localisation, and transparent AI coaching.

0.details: First wave of explorers test collaborative itineraries, AR translation, and sustainability missions alongside our team.

1.details: Expanded language support, travel journal exports, and integrations with accessibility partners land for summer adventures.

2.details: Goal of 10,000 travellers across Latvia and neighbouring regions, with classroom pilots and tourism collaborations.

differentiators.title: Trustworthy travel intelligence
differentiators.lead: NodeVoyage blends signage-inspired clarity with travel storytelling. It is approachable for first-time travellers and powerful for adventure planners who want deeper context.

0.title: AI that explains itself
0.copy: Every itinerary comes with plain-language reasoning, accessible alternatives, and opt-out controls.

1.title: Inclusive by default
1.copy: AAA contrast themes, reduced-motion support, and multi-language content are core—not add-ons.

2.title: Built with partners
2.copy: Co-designed with travel educators, accessibility advocates, and signage specialists from Ideju Kauss programmes.

explorers.title: Be first aboard the beta
explorers.copy: Leave your details to receive early access invites, mission briefs, and behind-the-scenes updates as we prepare the public beta. We keep emails minimal and never share your contact.

form.success: Thanks! We just opened your email client so you can confirm the request.
form.privacy: By joining, you agree to receive NodeVoyage development updates. You can unsubscribe anytime and we will only use your email for these messages.
form.error: Add a valid email so we can send your invite.
form.subject: NodeVoyage Explorers Club signup

cta.title: Curious about Ideonautix too?
cta.copy: If you are exploring NodeVoyage for team retreats or student programmes, take a look at Ideonautix—our startup OS that keeps creative projects on track. Both platforms share the same inclusive design system.

team.title: Team
team.lede: Based in Daugavpils, Latvia. We build accessible AI tools and explain how to use them in plain language.

contact.title: Contact
contact.lede: Tell us what you want to achieve. We'll reply with a simple plan.
